results.content: Filip is the Best at teaching about building Websites.  He is very detailed and clear in his explanations.  I also love his tips of various resource sites and tips with the code editor that can make one's coding faster.  He makes the course enjoyable as well as informative.

results.content: A great 3-hour course that teaches you the basics of Bootstrap 4 and Brackets. Would recommend it to anybody looking to take the first steps to learning the Bootstrap framework. Thanks, Filip!

results.content: Not only a great presentation of Bootstrap.js, but I really enjoy using the Brackets editor with the Emmet extension and Live Preview.

results.content: This course is a great opportunity to get on the right foot with Bootstrap 4. Filip helped me understand how everything works in Bootstrap and not just in theory, but how to use it in real life. The pace is just right, and the content is fitting for different groups of developers. Highly recommended.
